name: Annamrita Foundation
briefDescription: Annamrita is a strategic program to liberate the underprivileged children from scourge of hunger and malnutrition, this program is being implemented by Annamrita in aided and Non-aided Schools in Delhi,Maharashtra,Rajasthan, Andhra Pradesh, Madhya Pradesh, Uttar Pradesh,Haryana and Assam.Everyday, Annamrita is feeding over 12 Lac meals to underprivileged Children in aided and non-aided Schools across India. Annamrita believes in providing children with the right nutrition to support their education.Annamrita program is based on the belief that ‘you are what you eat’. Therefore one nutritious meal a day brings thousands of children to school. You can help every child in this country get an education, if you donate that one wholesome meal.
